page.title: 06BROADFIELD MILLS LOCKWOOD
page.content: The mill is{5yrs}old. The{old building was{demolished}in{1979.}The old building was{built}in{1863.}They demolished the old building because the{cloth}they were making was{too {expensive}so they decided to demolish it and build a{new one.}They bought {new machines}and{threw out}the old ones.{Six years}ago{65 people}were employed but they didn't make as many {trousers and skirts}as they do now. Only{45 people}are employed now of which{11}are{ladies}and they do any jobs which are{suitable.}The mill is employing{three more people}this year than they were{last year.}They make {boys trousers and girls skirts}which they{sell}to{Marks and Spencers {Department Stores.}They {export}their goods to{Hong-Kong, America and {Canada.
